sectionText: This course is only open to students accepted to attend the Alternative Spring Break immersive trip in Chicago's Tech Scene. The trip itself is March 20-24, 2017, and this required course meets February 24, March 3, March 10, and March 31.   Applications for 2016 are accepted through November 30, 2016 at go.illinois.edu/ilink - search for title Alternative Spring Break; Search Employer: Pritzker Venture Capital. Must have a minimum of sophomore standing, an interest in entrepreneurship, and be an engineering major.
